page.title: 20Farming In Our Area
page.content: In our area there are about eight farms and several smallholdings.The big ones are Overbury Estates,Darbys and Grays.The most common crop is{corn but there is some{Oilseed Rape scattered around.There are mainly{beef {cattle}but some herds of{dairy cattle A lot of fields are used for grazing and other purposes such as silage and hay. The larger landowners practice a lot of{conservation,}with tree planting schemes,new ponds etc. There are large herds of sheep at Overbury and there was until recently a pig farm in Bredon. The smaller farms are much less specialised and you are likely to find all kinds of crops and animals on the same farm.
